Text: Did you forget your FREE Click Pay serviceDear Don We just want to make sure you didnt forget this convenient FREE way to pay your NextCardR bill Remember you can easily avoid the hassle of sending your bill through the mail and the frustration of late fees with NextCard Click PaySM Click Pay offers you a free and easy way to pay your NextCard bill online hours a day You can even have your bill paid automatically so you never have to worry about it To enroll in Click Pay use the following link Youll be taken to a Click Pay enrollment page to sign up Its that easy Cut and paste this link into a Web browser UMTaspA Take a moment now to enroll in NextCard Click Pay Its FREE and it will save you money time and paperwork Sincerely NextCard Cardholder Services NextCard wwwnextcardcom
